  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085915</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Rice farming and rural life in Vietnam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reisbewirtschaften und landwirtschaftliche 
Lebensdauer in Vietnam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affermage de riz et vie rurale au Vietnam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cultivar do arroz e vida rural em Vietnam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Agricoltura del riso e vita rurale nel Vietnam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καλλιέργεια ρυζιού και αγροτική ζωή στο Βιετνάμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cultivar del arroz y vida rural en Vietnam</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Photographs and text tell the story of rice and rural life in Southeast Asia, with an emphasis on the highlanders, or Montagnards.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotographien und Text erklären die Geschichte des
Reises und der landwirtschaftlichen Lebensdauer in Südostasien, mit 
Betonung auf die Highlanders oder Montagnards.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les photographies et le texte indiquent l'histoire
du riz et de la vie rurale en Asie du Sud-Est, avec une emphase sur 
les montagnards, ou Montagnards.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As fotografias e o texto dizem a história do 
arroz e da vida rural em Ásia do sudeste, com uma ênfase nos 
highlanders, ou Montagnards.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le fotografie ed il testo dicono alla storia di 
riso e di vita rurale in Asia sudorientale, con un'enfasi sui 
highlanders, o a Montagnards.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι φωτογραφίες και το κείμενο λένε την ιστορία του 
ρυζιού και της αγροτικής ζωής στη Νοτιοανατολική Ασία, με μια 
έμφαση highlanders, ή Montagnards.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las fotografías y el texto dicen la historia del 
arroz y de la vida rural en Asia suroriental, con un énfasis en los 
montañeses, o Montagnards.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
